sentence: The  Gaza  health  ministry  said  this  week  that  more  than  29,000  people  have  been  killed  since  the  start  of  the  war,  triggered  by  an  attack  on  Israel  by  Hamas  on  Oct.  7  that  killed  1,200  people.

The  Gaza  health  ministry  said  this  week  that  more  than  29,000  people  have  been  killed  since  the  start  of  the  war,  triggered  by  an  attack  on  Israel  by  Hamas  on  Oct.  7  that  killed  1,200  people.
